title: Baltimore-Washington Parkway: Park Home
body: Scenic Entry to the Nation's Capital  This 29-mile highway connects Baltimore, MD and Washington, D.C. The parkway has carried visitors to and from the capital city since 1954.              Scenic Entry to the Nation's Capital   This 29-mile highway connects Baltimore, MD and Washington, D.C. The parkway has carried visitors to and from the capital city since 1954.            Greenbelt Park Campground   The Greenbelt Park Campground is Exit 193 West of the Baltimore Washington Parkway        The United States Park Police    The D-5 station is located at 6501 Greenbelt Road near the entrance of Greenbelt Park         Gladys Noon Spellman   The parkway is dedicated to Gladys Noon Spellman
